attributes.action: Stop Julien Blanc coming to the UK to promote sexual assault
attributes.additional_details:
Julien Blanc and his group, RSD (Real Social Dynamics) are a group of sexist and racist "pick up artists," who have made a living by teaching men how to violate women through physical and emotional abuse.

Do not associate the UK with a man who chokes women around the world as part of his pick up game. Please stand with the women of Australia, the women of America, and women everywhere, and do not allow him into the UK to host events where men are being taught how to violate and harass women.

Here is a transcription of one of his videos, "White Male Fucks Asian Women In Tokyo (And The Beautiful Methods To It)":

"At least in Tokyo, if you're a white male, you can do what you want. I'm just romping through the streets, just grabbing girls' heads, just like, head, pfft on the dick. Head, on the dick, yelling, 'pikachu,' with a pikachu shirt."

Refuse him a visa.
